phrases: Not only has Jellal been resurrected, but the seal on Nirvana has...
We may have defeated one of Oracion Seis,
but it seems like bad things are happening all around!
And that is exactly why you cannot get a boyfriend.
What does that have to do with anything?
If it is love and dreams and you it will become magical.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
I kind of admired this powerful world,
Frozen time has started to move again
I do not need any complicated answers.
Simple feelings are the most important.
You can change those tears she would on sad nights into strength.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
So basically, under that light, good and evil are switched, right?
I do not care who, just come at me!
I will beat the crap outta you all, and destroy everything!
I think he might not be all that different...
Guess good and evil do not really matter much to him.
We need to follow after Natsu-kun and Erza-san,
and find some way to stop Nirvana!
I are not going to let you get anywhere near Erza!
What the hell are you doing here?
What happened to the speedy one?
Damn it... I am in a hurry here!
Looks like you fell for it, Natsu.
Your weak point really is transportation.
So how do you like the feeling of riding a raft bobbing up and down...
Hurry up and kick the bucket, you slant-eyed, seasick bastard!
The usual battle between us two...
Would you try and refrain from hurling after saying my name?
You are going too far, Gray!
Unless he stole your fish or something, then it is okay!
Even then, I do not think so.
I will get to you after I finish this guy off, so do not get in my way!
Could Gray have fallen into the darkness?
It is stopped, so get it together already!
Natsu, I am coming to save you!
Happy can fly in the sky.
Is that how you become if you fall into darkness from Nirvana's influence?
Lucy as seen by Gray: A newcomer to the guild.
Looks are very much to his liking.
More naive than at first glance.
He is acting strange, that is true.
Is this the effect of Nirvana?
The people who fall into darkness are ones with feelings in the gap between good and evil...
Gray is not one to be moved so much by those kinds of feelings!
Even if you transform into Lucy-san, you are not going to fool us.
Men like you have a weak spot for women, yes?
Cut it out with the boob bobbing ogling!
What an uncouth wizard you are!
Argh, I do not know anymore!
You have quite a lot of keys.
You have even had an audience with the Spirit King?
And your magical power is not anything to laugh at either.
What is with this traitorous horse?
I would never... do something like...
Right now, I can do everything you can.
My body is moving on its own...
I would even if you did not tell me to!
Sagittarius, I am going to force your gate closed!
You take a break for a while!
I truly apologize, as it were.
Gate of the Archer, I open thee!
What in the world is going on?
I am the one who summoned you.
So that means I am your owner right now.
So with that settled, would you shoot down that flying cat for me?
Even if your body and abilities are the same...
You are not the real Lucy-dono!
Only I can do a forced closure.
Now, hurry up and shoot that cat!
Oh, do not worry about her.
Now that we have found Nirvana, that brat's role is over.
Next time I will be more helpful, really!
You are one of Oracion Seis!
And these guys can copy the body, powers, and thoughts of their opponent completely!
I am a Celestial Wizard too.
Just like it is not certain that we will fall into darkness,
Oracion Seis is not going to turn good so easily either.
Right now, Nirvana's effect does not matter!
Thankfully, there is a stream here... with water!
I would like those keys you have.
I am going to wipe you out and take your Spirits.
I will not let you do that!
Gate of the Water Bearer, I open thee!
I do not care if I get swept up in it!
That is what I was intending from the start.
Gate of the Scorpion, I open thee!
That is one of the Zodiac!
It is been a while, yeah!
How do you do, Aquarius's owner?
And wait, what does this do to Aquarius's character?
Just try saying something negative about my Scorpio...
You are not never going to recover, you got it?
There is a restaurant where we can see Aurora...
So anyway, can I go back, Angel?
A little girl who does not even know about the relationship between Spirits...
My most powerful Spirit is blocked...
If you do not defeat her, then the guild will be...
Perhaps I did not tell you?
What is most important is the relationship between the Spirits.
Gate of the Ram, I open thee.
Why do you have Karen's Spirit?
Because I am the one that offed her!
This here is just the spoils of battle.
Even though that woman did not have much magic power,
she tried to force a simultaneous release of two spirits.
Although I was the one that finished her off.
I have taken the keys of all kinds of Celestial Wizards that I have wiped out.
I am also going to take those Spirits you use.
I am being consumed by hatred!
My heart is going to be stolen by Nirvana!
You finally meet again, but as enemies?
Loke, go back to your world.
Do not think so little of me, Lucy.
Even if we were once friends, with different owners, we are now enemies.
Even if it is against someone they have feelings for,
we will defeat the enemy for our master!
Well, this is interesting in its own way, so go ahead.
As expected from the leader of the Zodiacs...
She is no match for Leo, the Spirit specializing in battle, I guess.
Gate of the the Chisel, I open thee!
Aim for when Aries stops Leo's movement!
I am glad you met a nice owner...
So how do you like my simultaneous release?
I do not think you will be using your powerhouse Leo anytime soon.
It is not like Spirits die anyway, so what is the big deal?
And yet you call yourself a Celestial Wizard?
Gate of the Bull, I open thee!
I do not care who it is, if you make my Nice Body cry, I will not forgive you!
And another one bites the dust!
You cannot use so many Spirits like that without a huge amount of magical power.
She was abused by her previous owner.
And went through nothing but hardships...
And what do people say when they ask for favors again, Lucy-chan?
I want to let Aries and Loke be together!
It is we Celestial Wizards who are the only ones who can do that for them!
Other than my keys, I will give you anything!
Then that would be your life.
I cannot just let my friend disappear in front of my eyes!
Wait, did the cool one fall into darkness?
My magic, Archive, is going to give you the knowledge of a super powerful spell, just this once!
But the bonds you have with your Spirits wrapped me in the light.
I know you will be able to use this magic!
I am counting on you, Lucy!
Make unto my body as to shine with the radiance of the countless stars.
Tetra Biblos, I am the ruler of the stars.
Aspect, cast open the gate of perfect malevolence...
I figured you would be able to do it.
I thought I blew Jellal away at the Tower of Heaven...
And he is come back for revenge!
Then maybe he is an identical twin?
The twin was a fake he made with magic.
A cat's brain cannot think of anything else.
Cannot go relying on your brain, can we, Happy?
Although I think I am way smarter than you, Natsu!
